AzureBlade: Then what we need is to make a diversion. Here is what I 
propose.

He presses a button under his arm and projects a quickly devised 
holo representation of Unicron.

AzureBlade: I will need fliers, maybe three or four. We will harass 
Unicron with High-Power weapons. This won't kill it, but it will be 
enough so that we bear the big of his aggression, especially if he 
transforms. The Tripred Gun will also be able to do that.

He closes the holo and stares at Hydras.

AzureBlade: Let me have my own command and I assure you that Unicron 
will regret coming here.
